document.full_text: as a young chinese doctor earning 4,000 yuan ($600) a month, zhang fei was faced with having to cough up 2,000 yuan for a bill that a patient left unpaid after zhang removed a tumor from her womb.
document.title: china faces uphill battle to give better healthcare
lines_and_colors: as a young chinese doctor earning 4,000 yuan ($600) a month, zhang fei was faced with having to cough up 2,000 yuan for a bill that a patient left unpaid after zhang removed a tumor from her womb.
